description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 08 March 2021 (RN: 20/03732/FULL) for the: Single storey rear extension with external landscaping following demolition of existing side and rear additions; Rear extension to existing flat-roofed North East Bay; New metal fence and Entrance gate; Rear skylight to replace existing, plant, all in connection with use as single dwellinghouse. NAMELY, alteration to, and introduction of windows and doors; replacement of existing timber side entrance to be rendered to match the main house; metal railings to the front elevation; traditional cast iron railings to rear elevation; soil vent pipes to rear and side elevations; ridge tiles to the south east bay; and retention of the flank wall in yellow stock brick instead of the approved rendering.
decision_conditions: Design ext appearance OK not in CA
+1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
Plant noise - area above WHO level
